# Upgrade Plan: Upgrade to Latest LTS Versions

## Overview
This plan upgrades the Java application to the latest Long-Term Support (LTS) versions: Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4.

## Objectives
- Upgrade Java runtime to version 21 (latest LTS)
- Upgrade Spring Boot framework to version 3.4
- Migrate from javax.* to jakarta.* namespace (required for Spring Boot 3.x)
- Ensure application builds and tests pass after upgrade

## Tasks
See `tasks.json` for detailed task breakdown and execution order.

## Expected Benefits
- Access to latest Java language features and performance improvements
- Enhanced security with latest LTS releases
- Long-term support and maintenance for both Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
- Compatibility with modern libraries and tools
